long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fimbre is all about the people you know and services they trust. It is a social networking app that helps you find trusted reviews and recommendations from the people within your circles. Now no more you need to visit numerous websites and find reviews from anonymous users, which leaves you lost and wondering. Fimbre helps you find that perfect restaurant for a candle light dinner, the best dentist for your dad or the most thrilling movie of the week. Fimbre helps you find the right services using recommendations from the folks you trust in your real world.
